desc: What are the risks that could make Bitcoin fail?

msgs.text: What are the risks that could make Bitcoin fail?

51 % Attack This fear surfaces all the time, that a hacker group or some bad actors take control of the network by gaining the majority of the hashing power and being able to alter the blockchain (double spend). It is fascinating to learn about and how it is extremely unlikely to take place on the Bitcoin Network. Learn more here and feel free to discuss: https://youtu.be/KUd8ZGgm6Qo Technical description: https://learnmeabitcoin.com/technical/51-attack Cost of a 51% attack: https://gobitcoin.io/tools/cost-51-attack/ Crypto51 Another calculator of 51% attack of PoW chains: https://www.crypto51.app/
